abstract: Driven column review of Chevrolet Cruze compact car.

headline.print_headline: A Compact to Add to Your Shopping List
headline.main: Video Review: Chevy Cruze May Help You Ditch Your Comfort Zone

keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The second-generation model costs more than other compacts, but it’s quiet, comfortable, attractive, efficient and dependable — and well worth a test drive....
lead_paragraph: The second-generation model costs more than other compacts, but it’s quiet, comfortable, attractive, efficient and dependable — and well worth a test drive.
